# Agustín Díaz Cano - Quantitative Systems Engineer

## Summary
Agustín Díaz Cano is a Quantitative Systems Engineer and MSc Candidate focused on Low Latency Architecture, Algorithmic Trading (HFT), and Distributed Systems. Experience includes C++, Rust, and managing game server infrastructure with 200k+ users.
